name: N1NE: The Splintered Mind Part 1
summary: N1NE: The Splintered Mind is a Cyberpunk narrative-driven game, designed for VR. In the year 2099 you play a resourceful detective as you explore, interact, investigate and interrogate your way to the bottom of a suspicious murder that will take you through the real world as well as Nu.Real.

name: N1RV Ann-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action
summary:
"Escape from VA11 HALL-Aâ€™s Glitch City to Saint Alicia, an idyllic tourist paradise with an upscale bar called N1RV Ann-A. But opulence and extravagance are merely smokescreens: the artificial island hides a seedy underbelly. Its dystopian economy touches all aspects of life as bar patrons contend with mafia extortion, human trafficking and other sordid crimes.

For bartender Sam, trouble hits close to home. Her relationship with her partner Leon, who moonlights as a Yakuza, is on the rocks as she works hard to care for their 8-year-old son, Tony.

Is their relationship dead in the waters of the caribbean sea? Or will love prevail in the unnatural city?"

name: N+1: New Life For Unemployed Youth!
summary: This is an independent game of magical realism that attempts to break the barriers between virtuality and reality and find the meaning of human life in a meaningless, repetitive, boring and obscure life.
